response.job_title: IT Cloud Administrator | AWS x1 | Azure x1 | OCI x1
response.summary:
I am a competent electronic engineer with knowledge on automation, services oriented architecture and middleware administration. 
Currently, I install, manage, maintain and tune middleware enterprise software for ATH client.

IT Certifications:
- (CLF-C01) AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner
- (AZ-900) Microsoft Certified: Azure Fundamentals
- (1Z0-1085-21) Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Foundations 2021 Certified Associate
- (C9510-418) IBM Certified System Administrator - WebSphere Application Server Network Deployment V9.0
- IBM Technical Specialist Profession Certification - Level 1


OS Expertise: AIX, Linux, IBM i (OS400), Amazon Linux (AWS EC2), RHEL

Containers: Docker, Kubernetes

IBM Suite Administrator:
- IBM API Connect v2018, v10
- IBM Integration Bus v10
- MQ v7, 8, 9
- Websphere Application Server (WAS) v7, 8.5, 9.0
- WebSphere Service Registry and Repository (WSRR) v8.5
- Webshere Message Broker v7.0
- InfoSphere Datastage v9.1, 11.5, 11.7
response.skills: Amazon Web Services (AWS), Oracle Cloud Infrastructure, Microsoft Azure, Openshift, Kubernetes, IBM Cloud, AWS, Linux, AIX, Resolución de problemas, Análisis, Ingeniería, Análisis de datos, Capacidad de análisis, Integración, Arquitectura orientada a servicios (SOA), Administración de sistemas, Microsoft Excel, Microsoft PowerPoint, Microsoft Word

company.name: Kyndryl
company.description:
We have the world’s best talent that design, run, and manage the most advanced and reliable technology infrastructure each day. Together, we think holistically about the health of these vital technology ecosystems.

We are a focused, independent company that builds on our foundation of excellence by creating systems in new ways. Bringing in the right partners, investing in our business, and working side-by-side with our customers to unlock potential. We're raising the bar.

Our experience speaks for itself: We have 90,000 highly skilled employees around the world serving 75 of the Fortune 100. But our purpose is what drives us: Advancing the vital systems that power human progress. Because when a digital ecosystem is healthy, it can more readily adapt and support continuous growth and that opens up a world of possibility for everyone.

Together, we are the heart of progress.
